title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Socio-Scientific Issues (SSI) Decision-Making for Pre-Service Biology Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply an analytical decision-making style in SSI (Socioscientific Issues) contexts
Learners can design SSI decision-making strategies considering learners' gender, grade level, and regional characteristics
Learners can develop SSI learning simulations that combine cognitive processes and creative approaches

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
